评论详情: I’m really impressed with these Men’s Hip Hop Baggy Jeans! The wide-leg design gives them a cool, relaxed vibe that’s perfect for streetwear. They’re super comfortable and roomy, making them ideal for casual wear or even for skating. The loose fit gives plenty of freedom to move, while the denim material feels durable yet soft. I love how they’re versatile enough to dress up or down, and the overall style is effortlessly trendy. If you’re looking for jeans that combine comfort and style, these are a great choice! Highly recommend!
Perfect fit comfortable and so far holding up great for my teenage boy who is hard on clothes.  Best part is they have become a go to pair of pants for him and not just stuffed in the closet floor.

Electrician here. My trade doesn't really matter for this review. I just have the habit of beginning my reviews with that statement. One might be surprised to read that these jeans are for me and I am 55 years old. No, it's not some sort of end-life crisis. I've always been a fan of the baggy shorts and jeans. I still have a couple pair of JYNCO that I haven't worn to death. It's not very often that any men's clothing, especially pants, pops up on the Vine site. I ordered these as soon as they were available. There was a very long delay in shipping; one which I had to approve (saying I still wanted my item) when it was clear it would not arrive in a timely manner. I do not know the cause of the delay and feel it might be slightly unfair to dock a star because of it. I'm also not sure how I feel about the striped fading. It's not quite as prominent of the tiny Vine product image. When I opened the package and removed the jeans, I thought the stripes might be some kind of flaw in coloring. I checked the actual product and, sure enough, the stripes are there. Interesting. Anyway, the jeans are faded and worn. I don't know if they're pre-washed, or stone washed, or whatever; but, they feel as soft and worn as jeans I've had for a decade. They're very comfortable.
perfect baggy fitt, good breatheable material, look just like the photo.

I got these jeans for my 14 year old son. He says these baggy jeans are stylish and comfortable. The wide-leg, loose-fit design provides a relaxed vibe while offering plenty of room for movement, making them ideal for skating or everyday casual wear. The high-quality denim feels durable yet soft, and the classic baggy style is versatile enough to pair with hoodies, tees, or sneakers. These jeans strike the perfect balance between retro and modern, making them a standout addition to his wardrobe. They are also true to size. He is about 5'6" and 115 pounds and I got him a size small.

评论概述: Solid Baggy Jeans, but Not Quite Like the 90s
评论详情: I got these because they reminded me of JNCOs, and they did not disappoint in terms of fit. They’re loose and comfortable but not as baggy as classic JNCOs—I’d say they could use another 5-6 inches at the bottom for that true retro vibe.  I ordered a medium for my 32-inch waist, and the fit was perfect with no need for a belt. My only disappointment is the fabric—it’s thinner than the thick, durable material 90s jeans were known for.  Overall, a solid option if you’re looking for hip-hop-style baggy jeans, but don’t expect the heavy-duty feel of vintage denim.

The waist has an interesting design ... it's like a weird button fly triangle.. The pants are totally wide from the seat to the floor. they are the perfect size that I don't step on the edge of the bottoms. The materials are a nice soft blue jean material and pretty comfy.
Teenage son loves them .  He is 6'3" 160 lbs and we got the large which fits him at his hips just how he likes them.

My daughter actually ordered these and the fit wasn't quite right so she can't use them. However, they are nice jeans. The denim is a good weight; not super thick but not so thin they'll tear easily. They'd be great for someone who fits into them.
These have a great baggy fit and I love styling these. The wash on them is incredible and it is very comfortable. Definitely adds a lot of variety to your clothes.

90's are back & the kids want the parachute jeans. These fit the bill and my teenage son couldn't be happier. He loves these pants. I love that they are good quality, and they wash well. The denim is a good quality and they are heavy denim. I ordered him size small and he is 5'7" and approx 135-140 lbs. They fit perfectly!
These pants look as pictured and the sizing seems correct. They are quite baggy in the legs but the waist fits good. They seem like very durable pants and are comfortable.

According to their chart, these should have fit. However, the waste was much too small.  This review is for the product listed as, “DFGIGT Mens Hip Hop Baggy Jeans Wide Leg Stylish Skater Jeans Casual Loose Fit Denim Pants Streetwear (B10 Black, X-Large)."

I love these jeans! They are super soft and comfortable. The distressed fabric feels like they are authentically worn in over time. Wide legs add even more comfort. They are long and baggy, and bring a casual relaxed style. Look great with a T-shirt or loose fitting sweater. Great for lounging or hanging out with friends. Highly recommended.
These are great! I got these for my kid and they were perfect! They fit well and comfortably! I recommend these!

This is a great jean for boys. The style, craft, color and size are perfect. It looks really nice with different shirts or coats. The fit is loose but very fashionable. It also matches different shoes well, including sneakers and leather shoes. Really love it. Nice pants!

DFGIGT never disappoints me with their clothing. However, these jeans have a sizing issue. We ordered them according to the size chart and they're a size too small. The material and style of the pants are incredible, but being a size too small, they're uncomfortable and lack the baggy look.

I’ve always preferred baggy jeans. These are perfect for me. They fit great! The quality is nice too. I typically wear a 30x30 which are a bit long for me (5,9” tall) and went with their recommended size XS. These fit me like my other 30/30 jeans. I’m happy I got these. If you like baggy jeans these may be perfect for you

评论概述: Soft but thick or heavy Jean material
评论详情: I usually buy jeans with a number size, so this was a little bit of a guessing game with the large, medium and small sizing. I got an extra large for my son, and while they are definitely a big, loose fit, they don’t fit his waist when most extra large pants do. It’s too bad the size doesn’t fit because the pants themselves are an awesome material that feels like it will last while also being worn into a very soft comfortable feeling. I feel like everyone’s favorite pair of jeans that are worn out but the material is heavy and thick so I don’t feel like they’re actually worn out. Hopefully that makes sense anyways, good luck figuring out the size because they don’t fit like jogging pants or shorts.
These jeans look exactly like the photo. They are well made and comfortable to wear. My son loves them.
brand by DFGIGT men’s wide leg stylish skater style jeans. Casual loose fit denim material jeans. Vintage style wash in Black color. Size is medium. Fits how my son loves his jeans. Loose and baggy.

My husband likes the style of these jeans, and can always use more everyday jeans. The material is soft and comfortable for jean material, and they look nice on my husband. They are great for work or just everyday wear in general. At this price he can get a few more pairs and be set for a while. He normally wears 36x32 and the xl fits him very nicely. If you or someone you know likes this style of jeans, I definitely recommend them for the price.

My son loves Baggy, loose fit jeans and was excited to try these.  The quality of construction and feel of the material was pretty good and he likes the way they look.  They are also somewhat long which lets them pool a bit at the shoe, which he likes the look of.
This jeans are as described they are definitely baggy and the waist fits true to size the material quality is pretty good they are made well and look exactly as shown

These truly are baggy.  I got them two sizes bigger than what my son wears and he loves them. He wore them as soon as I washed them. They are a nice length which I love. They are comfortable and good quality.
My son is so fussy about the cut of his jeans, but these are comfy, well fitting and true to size. A great pair of jeans and look good, even if they are a little saggy for my taste!
